row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
!-------------------- Create Resource in server.xml -------------------------- echo "Check if server.xml exist in &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ValidateDocument -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "1" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
resource=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" -x '//Server/GlobalNamingResources/Resource[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource" ] ; then
echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# exists" : IF &UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_EXISTS# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF
else
echo 'Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# does not exist' echo 'Adding resource:' echo '&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#'
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" tomcat CreateDatasource "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" "//Server/GlobalNamingResources" '&RESOURCE_ELEMENT#' &UC4RB_TC_DS_PWD# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
! -------------------- Check if resource is created -------------------------- echo "Check if resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# created" resource=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" -x '//Server/GlobalNamingResources/Resource[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource" ] ; then echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# created" else echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is not created. Job fail" exit 2 fi fi
!-------------------- Create Resource Link in context.xml -------------------------- :IF &UC4RB_TC_RES_LINKS# = "YES"
echo "Check if context.xml exist in &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ValidateDocument -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "1" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
resource_link=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x '//Context/ResourceLink[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource_link" ] ; then echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# exists" exit 0 else echo 'Adding resource link:' echo '&RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#' java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML AddElement -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x "//Context" -e '&RESOURCE_LINK_ELEMENT#' -filter all :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX fi
!-------------------- Check if resource link is created -------------------------- echo "Check if resource link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# created" resource_link=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x '//Context/ResourceLink[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource_link" ] ; then echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# created!" else echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is not created. Job fail!" exit 2 fi
:ENDIF
exit 0
! :IF &UC4RB_TC_RESTART_TOMCAT# = "YES" ! : PSET &UC4RB_TC_RESTART_TOMCAT_UNIX# = "YES" ! :ENDIF
